easyStandard.skull: -2. This token has an additional -1 for each Innocent Reveler underneath the agenda deck.
easyStandard.cultist: Reveal another token. If you fail this test, draw the top card of the encounter deck.
easyStandard.tablet: -3. If you fail, deal 1 damage or 1 horror to the nearest Innocent Reveler in play.
easyStandard.elderThing: -4. If you fail and Cnidathqua is in play, it attacks you.

hardExpert.skull: -2. This token has an additional -1 for each Innocent Reveler underneath the act or agenda decks.
hardExpert.cultist: Reveal another token. If you fail this test, draw the top card of the encounter deck.
hardExpert.tablet: -4. Deal 1 damage or 1 horror to the nearest Innocent Reveler in play.
hardExpert.elderThing: -6. If you fail and Cnidathqua is in play, it attacks you.
